title: Love Addicts
overview: Love Addicts is telling the story of the adventurous, turbulent, and fun dating behavior of four young misfits. Dennis can't manage to separate himself from his possessive girlfriend. Nele chases away even the most perfect guys with her fairy tale fantasies. Mo freezes up when he is about to make an emotional connection. Katrin refrains from love, but makes up for it with throwaway sex.
